tweet_text:
2024 तक हर घर को शुद्ध पेयजल मिले इस हेतु PM @narendramodi जी के संकल्प को साकार करने की दिशा में अमेठी आज तेज़ गति से आगे बढ़ रही है।

अमेठी जनपद के तहत बरौलिया एवं धनापुर (मुसाफिरखाना) और करनाईपुर ग्राम (अमेठी) में लगभग ₹5.45 करोड़ की लागत वाले पेयजल योजना का लोकार्पण किया।
text_hi:

हर भारतवासी तक बेहतर स्वास्थ्य सुविधा पहुँचाने की दिशा में आज तेज गति से काम हो रहा है। मेडिकल शिक्षा, व्यवस्था अथवा इंफ्रास्ट्रक्चर, हर क्षेत्र में सरकार ज़रूरी कदम उठा रही है। #IndiaIndependenceDay

tweet_text: For the first time in independent India , SAMVAD will engage with functionaries in Panchayats thereby ushering in a silent revolution in addressing psychosocial challenges amongst vulnerable children.
text_en: For the first time in independent India , SAMVAD will engage with functionaries in Panchayats thereby ushering in a silent revolution in addressing psychosocial challenges amongst vulnerable children.

tweet_text: In the last 1 year, close to 1 lakh stakeholders comprising of Child Protection Functionaries, tele-counsellors, educators, law professionals & more have been trained under SAMVAD on providing coping mechanism to children in distress.
text_en: In the last year, close to lakh stakeholders comprising of Child Protection Functionaries, tele-counsellors, educators, law professionals & more have been trained under SAMVAD on providing coping mechanism to children in distress.

tweet_text: SAMVAD(Support Advocacy & Mental Health Intervention for Children in Vulnerable Circumstances & Distress) was initiated with @mheduNIMHANS to ensure holistic psychosocial well-being of children & adolescents. On the eve of Independence Day, launched 2nd phase of SAMVAD programme. https://t.co/yera1uBCAB
text_en: SAMVAD(Support Advocacy & Mental Health Intervention for Children in Vulnerable Circumstances & Distress) was initiated with to ensure holistic psychosocial well-being of children & adolescents. On the eve of Independence Day, launched nd phase of SAMVAD programme.

लोकहित को समर्पित सरकार के 7 वर्ष पूर्ण हुए हैं। अंत्योदय एवं सबका साथ, सबका विकास को केंद्र में रखकर देश को गतिशील बनाए रखने के लिए पीएम श्री @narendramodi जी को साधुवाद।

देश की सेवा और समृद्धि हेतु अपना विश्वास जताने व आशीर्वाद देने के लिए देशवासियों का धन्यवाद। #7YearsOfSeva

लोकहित को समर्पित सरकार के 7 वर्ष पूर्ण हुए हैं। अंत्योदय एवं सबका साथ सबका विकास को केंद्र में रखकर देश को गतिशील बनाए रखने के लिए पीएम श्री  जी को साधुवाद।

text_en: Government stands in solidarity with families who lost their earning member due to Covid. Families of such persons will be given Pension under ESIC & insurance under EPFO has been liberalised & enhanced to maximise financial benefit.

tweet_text:
Health Insurance:

- All children will be enrolled as a beneficiary under Ayushman Bharat Scheme (PM-JAY) with a health insurance cover of Rs. 5 lakhs.

- The premium amount for these children till the age of 18 years will be paid by PM CARES
text_en: Health Insurance:- All children will be enrolled as a beneficiary under Ayushman Bharat Scheme (PM-JAY) with a health insurance cover of Rs. lakhs.- The premium amount for these children till the age of years will be paid by PM CARES

tweet_text: As an alternative to educational loan, scholarship equivalent to the tuition fees/ course fees for undergraduate/vocational courses as per Government norms will be provided to under Central or State Government Schemes.
text_en: As an alternative to educational loan, scholarship equivalent to the tuition fees/ course fees for undergraduate/vocational courses as per Government norms will be provided to under Central or State Government Schemes.

tweet_text:
Support for Higher Education:
-Assistance to obtain education loan for Professional courses/Higher Education in India. 
-Interest on loan will be paid by PM CARES
-Children not eligible under existing scholarship schemes will be provide an equivalent scholarship through PM CARES
text_en: Support for Higher Education:-Assistance to obtain education loan for Professional courses/Higher Education in India. -Interest on loan will be paid by PM CARES-Children not eligible under existing scholarship schemes will be provide an equivalent scholarship through PM CARES

tweet_text:
School Education for children of 11-18 years:
-To be given admission in any Central Govt. residential school such as Sainik School, Navodaya Vidyalaya
-Child under the care of Guardian/ extended family to be given admission in the nearest Kendriya Vidyalaya or in a private school
text_en: School Education for children of -18 years:-To be given admission in any Central Govt. residential school such as Sainik School, Navodaya Vidyalaya-Child under the care of Guardian/ extended family to be given admission in the nearest Kendriya Vidyalaya or in a private school

tweet_text:
School Education for children under 10 years:
-To be given admission in the nearest Kendriya Vidyalaya or in a private school as a day scholar
-PM CARES to give fees as per RTE norms if child is admitted in a private school
-PM CARES to also pay for expenditure on uniform & books
text_en: School Education for children under years:-To be given admission in the nearest Kendriya Vidyalaya or in a private school as a day scholar-PM CARES to give fees as per RTE norms if child is admitted in a private school-PM CARES to also pay for expenditure on uniform & books

tweet_text:
Fixed Deposit in the name of the child: 
A special corpus of ₹10 lakh will be created for each child when he/she reach 18 years of age through PM CARES.
- Monthly stipend for 5 years from 18 years of age
- One lump-sum amount for personal & professional use on reaching 23 years.
text_en: Fixed Deposit in the name of the child: A special corpus of lakh will be created for each child when he/she reach years of age through PM CARES.- Monthly stipend for years from years of age- One lump-sum amount for personal & professional use on reaching years.

tweet_text: I thank Amethi District Administration for spreading awareness among citizens and putting up facilities in place and congratulate citizens of Amethi for joining hands with administration in ensuring expectant mothers’ life is not at risk due to disruption caused by pandemic.
text_en: I thank Amethi District Administration for spreading awareness among citizens and putting up facilities in place and congratulate citizens of Amethi for joining hands with administration in ensuring expectant mothers life is not at risk due to disruption caused by pandemic.

tweet_text: As a result of early exercise and plan in place, pregnant women in Amethi are receiving timely healthcare services and so far 44,314 have undergone institutional delivery at various government healthcare facilities in the district.
text_en: As a result of early exercise and plan in place, pregnant women in Amethi are receiving timely healthcare services and so far have undergone institutional delivery at various government healthcare facilities in the district.

tweet_text: Ahead of their estimated delivery date, administration in consultation with families admits pregnant woman to hospital wherein expectant mother is triaged for COVID infection & sent to separate facilities for isolation for special care & treatment if found infected with virus.
text_en: Ahead of their estimated delivery date, administration in consultation with families admits pregnant woman to hospital wherein expectant mother is triaged for COVID infection & sent to separate facilities for isolation for special care & treatment if found infected with virus.

tweet_text: Understanding the importance of special care & treatment needed for Covid positive expectant mother, separate labour room and operation theatre have been set up in advance for the safety of infected mother & new born as well as other pregnant women.
text_en: Understanding the importance of special care & treatment needed for Covid positive expectant mother, separate labour room and operation theatre have been set up in advance for the safety of infected mother & new born as well as other pregnant women.

tweet_text: Setting an example of Jan Bhagidari & participative governance, Amethi was able to ensure uninterrupted health, nutrition and immunisation services and Institutional Deliveries of 44314 pregnant women since March last year.
text_en: Setting an example of Jan Bhagidari & participative governance, Amethi was able to ensure uninterrupted health, nutrition and immunisation services and Institutional Deliveries of pregnant women since March last year.

tweet_text: मैं @DmAmethi के प्रति आभार व्यक्त करती हूँ जिन्होंने मेरे निवेदन पर अमेठी में कोरोना टीकाकरण के प्रति समाज में जागरूकता बढ़ाने के लिए प्रबुद्ध लोगों के साथ बात की। समाज में जागरूकता से कोरोना को रोकने एवं टीकाकरण को तीव्र करने में मदद मिलेगी। #IndiaFightsCorona @CMOfficeUP https://t.co/5OWrlkYvKE
text_hi: मैं  के प्रति आभार व्यक्त करती हूँ जिन्होंने मेरे निवेदन पर अमेठी में कोरोना टीकाकरण के प्रति समाज में जागरूकता बढ़ाने के लिए प्रबुद्ध लोगों के साथ बात की। समाज में जागरूकता से कोरोना को रोकने एवं टीकाकरण को तीव्र करने में मदद मिलेगी।

tweet_text: मैं अमेठी जिला प्रशासन को नागरिकों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाने व सुविधाओं को स्थापित करने हेतु धन्यवाद देती हूँ, साथ ही अमेठी के नागरिकों को बधाई देती हूँ जिन्होंने प्रशासन के साथ समन्वय कर कोरोना काल में व्यवधानों के बावजूद गर्भवती माताओं के जीवन को सुरक्षित रखना सुनिश्चित किया है।
text_hi: मैं अमेठी जिला प्रशासन को नागरिकों के बीच जागरूकता फैलाने व सुविधाओं को स्थापित करने हेतु धन्यवाद देती हूँ साथ ही अमेठी के नागरिकों को बधाई देती हूँ जिन्होंने प्रशासन के साथ समन्वय कर कोरोना काल में व्यवधानों के बावजूद गर्भवती माताओं के जीवन को सुरक्षित रखना सुनिश्चित किया है।

tweet_text: प्रारंभिक अभ्यास और योजना के परिणामस्वरूप, अमेठी में गर्भवती महिलाओं को समय पर स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं मिल रही हैं और अब तक जिले में विभिन्न सरकारी स्वास्थ्य सुविधा केंद्रों में 44,314 महिलाओं का संस्थागत प्रसव संपन्न हुआ है।
text_hi: प्रारंभिक अभ्यास और योजना के परिणामस्वरूप अमेठी में गर्भवती महिलाओं को समय पर स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं मिल रही हैं और अब तक जिले में विभिन्न सरकारी स्वास्थ्य सुविधा केंद्रों में 44314 महिलाओं का संस्थागत प्रसव संपन्न हुआ है।

tweet_text: गर्भवती महिलाओं की अनुमानित प्रसव की तारीख से पहले, प्रशासन द्वारा परिवार के परामर्श पर गर्भवती महिला को अस्पताल में भर्ती किया जाता है, जहाँ गर्भवती महिला की कोविड जाँच की जाती है और संक्रमित पाए जाने पर विशेष देखभाल और आइसोलेशन के लिए सुविधाओं से युक्त वार्ड में भेजा जाता है।
text_hi: गर्भवती महिलाओं की अनुमानित प्रसव की तारीख से पहले प्रशासन द्वारा परिवार के परामर्श पर गर्भवती महिला को अस्पताल में भर्ती किया जाता है जहाँ गर्भवती महिला की कोविड जाँच की जाती है और संक्रमित पाए जाने पर विशेष देखभाल और आइसोलेशन के लिए सुविधाओं से युक्त वार्ड में भेजा जाता है।

tweet_text: कोविड पॉज़िटिव गर्भवती माताओं के लिए आवश्यक विशेष देखभाल और उपचार के महत्व को समझते हुए, संक्रमित माँ और नवजात के साथ-साथ अन्य गर्भवती महिलाओं की सुरक्षा के लिए पहले से ही अलग लेबर रूम और ऑपरेशन थियेटर की स्थापना की गई है।

tweet_text: जनभागीदारी और सहभागी शासन का एक उदाहरण स्थापित करते हुए, अमेठी जनपद विगत साल मार्च से अब तक कोरोना कल में भी 44,314 गर्भवती महिलाओं के निर्बाध स्वास्थ्य, पोषण और टीकाकरण सेवाएं और संस्थागत प्रसव सुनिश्चित कर पाया है।
text_hi: जनभागीदारी और सहभागी शासन का एक उदाहरण स्थापित करते हुए अमेठी जनपद विगत साल मार्च से अब तक कोरोना कल में भी 44314 गर्भवती महिलाओं के निर्बाध स्वास्थ्य पोषण और टीकाकरण सेवाएं और संस्थागत प्रसव सुनिश्चित कर पाया है।

tweet_text: With provision to generate automated alerts and efficient audit of the delivery system by documenting real time attendance of beneficiaries & duty bearers and effective training feedback mechanism in place, POSHAN Tracker is an end-to-end real time Nutrition tracking system.
text_en: With provision to generate automated alerts and efficient audit of the delivery system by documenting real time attendance of beneficiaries & duty bearers and effective training feedback mechanism in place, POSHAN Tracker is an end-to-end real time Nutrition tracking system.

tweet_text:
Since the launch of POSHAN Tracker, 

- over 14.05 lakh Anganwadi Workers have downloaded App

- over 7.08 crore beneficiaries have been on boarded on App

- over 1.24 crore Take Home Ration (THR) have been monitored

- 68.79 lakh Hot Cooked Meals (HCM) have been tracked
text_en: Since the launch of POSHAN Tracker, - over lakh Anganwadi Workers have downloaded App- over crore beneficiaries have been on boarded on App- over crore Take Home Ration (THR) have been monitored- lakh Hot Cooked Meals (HCM) have been tracked

tweet_text: POSHAN Tracker gives a 360-degree view & tracking of the Anganwadi Centre, nutrition service deliveries & complete beneficiary management for pregnant women, lactating mothers & children. Real-time update of beneficiaries on the defined indictors will enable timely interventions.
text_en: POSHAN Tracker gives a -degree view & tracking of the Anganwadi Centre, nutrition service deliveries & complete beneficiary management for pregnant women, lactating mothers & children. Real-time update of beneficiaries on the defined indictors will enable timely interventions.

tweet_text: With a view to strengthen and bring transparency in nutrition delivery services, @MinistryWCD launched ‘POSHAN Tracker’ App in March 2021. App developed as a governance tool for real-time monitoring of nutritional outcomes will be vital in improving maternal and child health.
text_en: With a view to strengthen and bring transparency in nutrition delivery services, launched POSHAN Tracker App in March . App developed as a governance tool for real-time monitoring of nutritional outcomes will be vital in improving maternal and child health.

tweet_text: I thank the Indian Academy of Pediatrics and its members for offering their services to vulnerable children; their commitment and GOI’s resolute efforts will make expert medical consultation just a phone call away for children living in Government Child Care Institutions.
text_en: I thank the Indian Academy of Pediatrics and its members for offering their services to vulnerable children; their commitment and GOIs resolute efforts will make expert medical consultation just a phone call away for children living in Government Child Care Institutions.

tweet_text: Currently teams of experts, from a strong network of 30000 Indian Academy of Pediatrics (IAP) members, are being constituted at Central, Zonal, State and City level to offer services to vulnerable children. Every Government run / aided CCI will have an expert assigned by the IAP.
text_en: Currently teams of experts, from a strong network of Indian Academy of Pediatrics (IAP) members, are being constituted at Central, Zonal, State and City level to offer services to vulnerable children. Every Government run / aided CCI will have an expert assigned by the IAP.

tweet_text: Care-takers / Child Protection Officers even from remotest corners of the country will be able to avail this telemedicine service by expert Pediatricians every afternoon 6 days a week. Thousands of children across more than 2000 CCIs will benefit through this service.
text_en: Care-takers / Child Protection Officers even from remotest corners of the country will be able to avail this telemedicine service by expert Pediatricians every afternoon days a week. Thousands of children across more than CCIs will benefit through this service.

tweet_text: With a view to provide expert care to children residing at Govt. Child Care Institutions (CCI) across the country, @MinistryWCD is engaging with Indian Academy of Pediatrics. This will be in addition to medical care provided to children under scheme for Child Protection Services.
text_en: With a view to provide expert care to children residing at Govt. Child Care Institutions (CCI) across the country, is engaging with Indian Academy of Pediatrics. This will be in addition to medical care provided to children under scheme for Child Protection Services.

tweet_text:
#PMJanDhan योजना के तहत अब तक 42.97 करोड़ लाभुकों का 55% अर्थात 23.80 करोड़ लाभार्थी महिलाएं हैं। कोरोना काल में 'PM गरीब कल्याण योजना' के तहत ₹30,945 करोड़ की सहायता राशि महिला जन-धन खातों में पहुंचाई गई है।

इस योजना ने देश की महिलाओं को आर्थिक रूप से सशक्त एवं जागरूक किया है।
text_hi:
योजना के तहत अब तक 4297 करोड़ लाभुकों का 55 अर्थात 2380 करोड़ लाभार्थी महिलाएं हैं। कोरोना काल में PM गरीब कल्याण योजना के तहत ₹30945 करोड़ की सहायता राशि महिला जनधन खातों में पहुंचाई गई है।

इस योजना ने देश की महिलाओं को आर्थिक रूप से सशक्त एवं जागरूक किया है।

वैक्सीन कूड़ेदान में ऑक्सीजन कंसंट्रेटर कबाड़ में।

कांग्रेस सरकार ने दलालों के माध्यम से ख़राब गुणवत्ता वाले 3540 हज़ार वाले कंसंट्रेटर ₹1 लाख तक निजी कंपनियों से खरीदे।

श्वेत पत्रों की नौटंकी से फुर्सत मिले तो राजस्थान सरकार पर भी ध्यान दें युवराज
